LanguageData.MSS_FP_Settings_OverrideRelicPool: Override the possible pool of relics with this mods list
LanguageData.MSS_FP_RitualOutcomeExtraDesc_Skylantern: Your skylanterns landed in a {0} colony, setting widespread fires and causing immense damage. They're here for revenge.
LanguageData.MSS_MRStreamer: Generations II by Mr Samuel Streamer
LanguageData.MSS_FP_Settings_DrawByMrStreamer: Show "By Mr Samuel Streamer" label (only used to disuade video theft and other digital larceny, leave disabled)
LanguageData.MSSFP_LoversRetreadText: {0} and {1} have left the colony to spend some time alone. They'll be back in about {2} hours.
LanguageData.MSSFP_LeapTooFar: frogge can't jump this far (max range {0} tiles)
LanguageData.MSSFP_LeapNoFuel: frogge doesn't have enough gems to power their leap (only {0}/{1})
LanguageData.MSS_BirthdayPickGene: Choose a {1} gene for {0_nameDef} to gain via mutation
LanguageData.MSS_FP_GeneEventChance_Tooltop: The chance for gene selections to appear on e.g. growth moments
LanguageData.MSS_FP_GoodGeneChance_Tooltip: The chance for events that give genes to give good genes.
LanguageData.MSS_FP_BadGeneChance_Tooltip: The chance for events that give genes to give bad genes.
LanguageData.MSS_FP_NeutralGeneChance_Tooltip: The chance for events that give genes to give neutral genes.
